notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: E.N., M.S., M.M.A., and V.D.F. conceived and designed the experiments; A.A.-s. provided reagents, materials, and analysis tools; M.S. and E.N. carried out microbiological assays; M.S., L.C., L.D.M., E.M. and L.F.S. performed the phytotoxic experiments; K.M. analyzed the data. All authors discussed the data obtained and collaborated in drafting the manuscript.
